cbinstall.description: Provides groups with Events to easily and quickly schedule between one another.

param.name: groups_events_content_plugins
param.label: Content Plugins
param.description: Enable or disable usage of content plugins content.prepare on group events.

param.name: groups_events_create_limit
param.label: Create Limit
param.description: Input number of events each individual user is limited to creating per group. If blank allow unlimited events. Moderators and group owners are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_events_address
param.label: Address
param.description: Enable or disable usage of location address. The address will automatically map to Google Maps.

param.name: groups_events_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on group events. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_events_message
param.label: Display
param.description: Enable or disable usage of event messages. Event message allows the event owner, group owner, group administrators to send a notification to all attending event guests. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_events_message_type
param.label: Type
param.description: Select how event messages should be sent.

param.name: groups_events_message_subject
param.label: Subject
param.description: Enable or disable usage of event message subject. This allows customizing the message subject. Note this only works with email message type.

param.name: groups_events_message_html
param.label: HTML
param.description: Enable or disable support for HTML in event messages.

param.name: groups_events_message_delay
param.label: Delay
param.description: Input the number of seconds between event messages. Leave empty for no delay. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_events_message_captcha
param.label: Captcha
param.description: Enable or disable usage of captcha on event message. Requires latest CB AntiSpam to be installed and published. Moderators are exempt from this configuration.

param.name: groups_events_attending_paging
param.label: Paging
param.description: Enable or disable usage of paging.

param.name: groups_events_attending_limit
param.label: Page Limit
param.description: Input page limit. Page limit determines how many rows are displayed per page. If paging is disabled this can still be used to limit the number of rows displayed.

param.name: groups_events_attending_search
param.label: Search
param.description: Enable or disable usage of search on rows.
